website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram FiveFingers Lontra offers a combination of the lightness and flexibility. The impressive traction, water-resistant feature and multi-layer upper make this a reliable minimalist running shoe, even when running in snowy condition.
pros: Some runners were impressed by the features of the shoe without affecting the weight
Based on reviews, the interior lining of the Lontra is very comfortable for sockless running
It has impressive grip, especially on wet surfaces, according to some testers
The Vibram Lontra is very flexible based on several runners’ accounts
It has a multi-layer laminated upper that offers water-resistance and insulation attributes
It has neoprene heel cuff to keep debris and snow out
The Lontra has reflective surfaces for increased visibility while running on low light
cons: The Lontra is an expensive shoe
Some runners experience irritation in the Achilles caused by the shoe’s neoprene ankle collar
Based on some reviews, the shoe is difficult to put on

customer_reviews.title: Wish they fit, go 2 sizes larger than other FiveFingers that fit you
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but can't give a better review because they are too small to wear. I own other FiveFingers and love them, I wish these fit so I could get a feel for whether or not they will allow me to wear them in colder conditions but even though they are the same size as my others they are too small to even stretch out well enough with wear (most have been better in the long run for me if they are a bit small new because they form to your feet well) unfortunately and they don't have the next sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Vtmom

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly loving these shoes
customer_reviews.text: they fit extremely perfect, was really difficult for me to put on but once i did they felt like a 2nd skin, walked around the house for about 30 mins an i for got i had them on :) would definitely buy more in the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fir wakking on ice/snow
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes when I walked out on the glacier in Canada at Jasper National Park. Felt sure footed the whole time and never slipped, even while jumping some little streams. My feet never got cold or wet.
customer_reviews.author: allsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as comfortable as my classics but not uncomfortable either if that ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was looking for! Living in the PNW I was looking for something that would keep my feet warm & dry during my walks. Totally fits the bill. Not quite as comfortable as my classics but not uncomfortable either if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni F

customer_reviews.title: better buy up a size
customer_reviews.text: toasty warm, nice padding...but probably should have bought a size larger. My third pair of vibrams...the other two fit alike...these are stiffer due to the lining and feel to snug. Will be fine for short runs.
customer_reviews.author: cathy mih taylor

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of 3 other pairs of FiveFingers, I am very impartial to these amazing shoes. However, this particular model is so stiff and uncomfortable, I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Godmother

customer_reviews.title: Like the classics better for most runs but these work ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit. Like the classics better for most runs but these work well in colder weather
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Though my other five fingers Spyridons fit, the fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Though my other five fingers Spyridons fit, the fit on these was not at all, so I could not wear them for any duration at all. They did arrive quickly and the refund went smoothly and did not take too long.
customer_reviews.author: S M W

customer_reviews.title: The vibram themselves are great, I have a pair already and it's the ...
customer_reviews.text: The vibram themselves are great, I have a pair already and it's the best workout shoe I've ever owned, as to why I was purchasing another pair. The ones I ordered unfortunately were to small for me 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes perfect for me.. This is my fifth pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!! I had to return mine and size 2 up!
customer_reviews.text: I have the trail running and walking Vibram Five FIngers in size 38. Not heading the warning of others I ordered the 38 and could not fit my naked foot in them, let alone thick socks for the cold! I got a 40 next time around and they fit great! Head the warning! Size up or you'll regret it. Also, great shoes! Haven't used them in the cnow yet but worked great in below 30 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size up, and even still the are really really hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Lee

customer_reviews.title: I am so grateful I read the reviews. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful I read the reviews. I normally wear a size 38, but ordered the 39 in this style. They do run small! The 39 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Webb

customer_reviews.title: Will be exchanging for a larger size
customer_reviews.text: "When they say fit runs small, they mean SMALL! I have been wearing Vibrams for years and have always worn a size 36. Even according to their sizing info it said I should be a 36. They're difficult to get on due to the neoprene around the ankle but even still, no way were they going to fit! Exchanging for a 38 just to be safe. If you plan on wearing socks, get an extra 2-3 sizes up from your norm."
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Viens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vibram option for colder weather
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of the Vibram shoes, including the Bikilas and the Jayas, but it is difficult for me to wear these styles in the cold weather, which is why I love the Lontra Trail Runner. It offers everything those of us who love vibram shoes and the barefoot technology offers, but it also provides stronger construction, a thicker sole, and higher height (up to ankles). When worn barefoot, you're feet will be warm, and for those extra cold days, I added the iniji socks.
customer_reviews.author: fit girl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Hey socks so cut the toes out now have socks lol love the toe shoes they fell great snow too deep here to wear out
customer_reviews.author: Debora Lee

customer_reviews.title: very hard to put foot in!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these so i was going to disregard how hard it was to put my foot through the opening. This model is smaller than my other vibram 5 fingers size 7. Also the web space between 4th and 5th toes was sharp. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Santora

product_meta.title: Desconocido Running W6453 Lontra, Women’s Lontra
product_meta.description: Multi-layer laminate upper with fully taped seams provides insulation and water resistance. Micro pile fleece liner is soft against the skin while wicking perspiration away from the foot.
feature_bullets: Outer Material: The main material is textile
Material Composition: The main material is textile
